question.questionText: You can tell if a rock contains calcite by putting it into a cold acid (like vinegar). Describe what you would observe if you did the acid test on a rock that contains this substance.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Many tiny bubbles will rise from the calcite when the calcite contacts the cold acid.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: You would see if it bubbles.
